entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is described as having fallen to the ground after hitting Harry with the Killing Curse.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story. He has been hit by Voldemort's Killing Curse and is lying on the ground waiting to be examined.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a Death Eater who seems to be hesitant to approach Harry or assist him in any way.

relationships.description: Voldemort hit Harry with the Killing Curse, causing both of them to fall unconscious.
Voldemort ordered Bellatrix to examine Harry and determine whether he is dead.
Harry was hit by Voldemort's Killing Curse, causing both of them to fall unconscious.
